text: Wo zai “tao la te” zhong wei tamen guiding:“Yi ming changming, yi yan chang yan, yi bi chang bi, yi er chang er, yi ya chang ya, yiqie chuangshang jie yi tongyang de dichang [zhu][baofu].” Shei yi shishe daiti baofu, zhe shi dui ta de shuzui. Shei wei yi an la suo jiang shi de [jingdian] panjue, zhexie ren que shi bu yi zhe.
